actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department, Education Department.

official_title: A bill to permit educational institutions with graduate programs in clinical social work to apply for grants and contracts to provide educational assistance to individuals from disadvantaged backgrounds.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to make schools with graduate programs in clinical social work eligible to participate in programs providing educational assistance to individuals from disadvantaged backgrounds.

titles.title: A bill to permit educational institutions with graduate programs in clinical social work to apply for grants and contracts to provide educational assistance to individuals from disadvantaged backgrounds.
